title: The OCE client date format is straight up wrong.

embed.description: For date formats in non-Gregorian calendars, see Calendar#Calendars in use. For Date and time format, see Date and time representation by country.

body:
All of Oceania uses DD/MM/YYYY.
Please change this.
(Mostly concerned about Match History, but I'm certain there are other areas where this should be applied.)
